short_description: weinhold textil is a packing & crating company based in waldenburg, germany.
long_description: wir produzieren umweltfreundlich und atmungsaktiv. die weinhold textil gmbh setzt auf zukunftsweisende biologisch abbaubare verpackungsmaterialien. sie möchten mehr über kompostierbare verpackungsnetze aus cellulose/baumwolle erfahren. clippernetze für obst, gemüse und weihnachtsbäume.
business_tags: fruit and vegetables | fossil resources | non-food
generated_description: weinhold textil, legally known as weinhold textil gmbh, based in callenberg, saxony, specializes in the production of biodegradable packaging nets made from cellulose and cotton. the company focuses on environmentally friendly and breathable packaging solutions, utilizing 100% renewable materials. their product range includes compostable nets for fruits, vegetables, and non-food items, designed to reduce the use of fossil resources. weinhold textil's nets are known for their natural appearance and soft handling, making them suitable for various packaging needs.
